entry.title: Re @PPathole @Rainmaker1973 The amazing part will be having an orbital rocket that is fully & rapidly reusable with any payload at all! Everyone else ...
entry.summary: Re @PPathole @Rainmaker1973 The amazing part will be having an orbital rocket that is fully & rapidly reusable with any payload at all! Everyone else gave up when they realized that their fully reusable payload<0. We still have a long way to go.

entry.title: RT SpaceX: Two years ago yesterday, SpaceX launched its first human spaceflight to the @space_station
entry.summary: RT SpaceX Two years ago yesterday, SpaceX launched its first human spaceflight to the @space_station National Air and Space Museum: Two years ago today, astronauts Bob Behnken and Doug Hurley launched to the ISS on board Crew Dragon "Endeavour," NASA’s first human spaceflight from American soil since the Space Shuttle retired: 📷 : NASA/Bill Ingalls https://youtu.be/adrSnRJLikk

entry.title: 10 years since SpaceX’s first mission to @Space_Station
entry.summary: 10 years since SpaceX’s first mission to @Space_Station SpaceX: Today marks the 10th anniversary of completion of the COTS Demo Flight 2 (COTS 2) – Dragon’s first mission to and from the @Space_Station
